thread.title: William Kelley
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by William Kelley

author: William Kelley
title: William Kelley
text: I purchased 4 new tires for my Ram truck and had a front end alignment done, from the Man behind the desk who was well dressed and knowledgeable of the product, to the guys in the garage who performed the work on my truck fast and accurately, they made for a pleasant experience that will assure my return in the future.
